"Hornyan": "I haven't seen your face before. I see... So you're a new arrival."
"Well then, once you've learned a little more, come back and see me."
"You came, as I hoped. I am Hornyan, the training instructor for Classes that use Techniques."
"It seems that you've grown a lot as an ARKS."
"If you wish, I can give you some personal guidance. Which Class's fighting style would you like to know about?"
"So, which Class's fighting style would you like to learn about?"
"Really? You don't have to be shy on my account, you know. If you change your mind, come back and see me again."
"If you do as I've taught you, your skill with Techniques will definitely improve."
"How is it going? Are you fighting the way I taught you?"
"My training should have taught you how important Class Skills are. Learn as many as you can, and master using them."
